interface.name: automount_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute automount in the automount domain.

interface.name: automount_exec_config
interface.summary: Execute automount in the caller domain.

interface.name: automount_read_state
interface.summary: Allow the domain to read state files in /proc.

interface.name: automount_dontaudit_getattr_tmp_dirs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of automount temporary directories.
